title: Mindflow Workshop: Integrated Mind-Immersion Process for Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational organizational learning theories and job-related scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: Emphasis on experiential learning in VR/simulation environments, with team-based project execution.

learning_goals: Learners can report a 20% reduction in work-related stress by applying mindfulness techniques in a VR simulation.
Learners can design work scenarios that achieve a score of 8 or higher (out of 10) on the Flow State Scale, a tool for measuring immersion.
In team projects, learners can propose three or more strategies to improve organizational efficiency by applying the Mindflow (Mind-Immersion Integration) strategy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
